content.yext/description: Competitive rates based on balance. Open a Prime Dime Interest Checking account today and earn up to 0.10% Annual Percentage Yield (APY)1 so that as your finances grow, so do your possibilities.

content.yext/description: Tariffe competitive basate sul saldo. Apri un conto di controllo degli interessi Prime Dime oggi e guadagna fino allo 0,10% di rendimento percentuale annuo (APY) 1 in modo che, man mano che le tue finanze crescono, aumentino le tue possibilità.
バランスに基づく競争率。今日、プライムダイムのインタレストチェックアカウントを開設し、最大0.10％の年間利回り（APY）1を獲得して、財政が成長するにつれて、可能性を拡大してください。
